text: The district of Signau in the Swiss canton of Bern has 9 municipalities in an area of 320 km². Municipality Population (Dec 2007) Area (km²) Eggiwil 2,507 60.3 Langnau im Emmental 8,699 48.5 Lauperswil 2,666 21.1 Röthenbach im Emmental 1,288 36.8 Rüderswil 2,341 17.2 Schangnau 906 36.5 Signau 2719 22.1 Trub 1,465 62.0 Trubschachen 1,461 15.6 Signau
title: Signau District
